description: Usually implies 「I was nice to you (gave you face) but you are taking advantage/being ungrateful」. Warning someone not to be arrogant.

examples.translation: Idiot serves you right, don't push your luck.

examples.chinese: 真他妈给你脸了,你算什么东西
examples.translation: Really giving you face, who do you think you are.

examples.chinese: 已读不回,我真是给你脸了
examples.translation: Read and ignored? I really gave you too much face (Don't push it).
